title: Tarea principal: Haz un plan de entrenamiento de Crossfit de 1 semana para una competencia de nivel intermedio
description: Haz un plan de entrenamiento de Crossfit de 1 semana para una competencia de nivel intermedio
intro: In breaking down the task of creating a 1-week Crossfit training plan for an intermediate-level competition, I have identified four key functional areas. Each area represents a distinct aspect of the training plan creation process, ensuring a comprehensive and well-structured approach to preparing for the competition.

subtasks.title: Assessment
subtasks.description: Responsible for evaluating the athlete's current fitness level, goals, and competition requirements to inform the training plan.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed assessment report outlining strengths, weaknesses, and specific areas for improvement.
responsibilities: Conduct fitness assessments to determine baseline performance.
Analyze competition requirements and athlete's goals.

subtasks.title: Conduct fitness assessments
subtasks.description: Determine athlete's baseline performance through various fitness tests.
subtasks.expected_output: Data on athlete's current fitness level, strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement.

subtasks.title: Analyze competition requirements and athlete's goals
subtasks.description: Review competition guidelines and athlete's objectives to align training plan with specific needs.
subtasks.expected_output: Clear understanding of competition demands and athlete's targets.

subtasks.title: Program Design
subtasks.description: Develops a structured training program tailored to the athlete's needs, focusing on improving strengths, addressing weaknesses, and peaking for the competition.
subtasks.expected_output: Comprehensive 1-week Crossfit training plan with daily workouts, rest days, and recovery strategies.
responsibilities: Design a balanced program that includes strength, conditioning, and skill work.
Incorporate periodization principles to optimize performance leading up to the competition.

subtasks.title: Assess Athlete's Current Fitness Level
subtasks.description: Evaluate the athlete's strengths, weaknesses, and current fitness level to tailor the training program accordingly.
subtasks.expected_output: Assessment report highlighting areas of improvement.

subtasks.title: Design Weekly Training Schedule
subtasks.description: Create a structured 1-week training plan that includes strength training, conditioning workouts, and skill practice sessions.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed daily workout schedule for the entire week.

subtasks.title: Implement Periodization Principles
subtasks.description: Incorporate periodization techniques to optimize performance leading up to the competition, including phases of preparation, peaking, and recovery.
subtasks.expected_output: Periodized training plan outlining different phases and goals.

subtasks.title: Nutrition Planning
subtasks.description: Focuses on creating a nutrition plan that supports the athlete's training, performance, and recovery needs during the competition preparation phase.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed nutrition guide outlining meal plans, macronutrient breakdown, and hydration strategies.
responsibilities: Calculate macronutrient requirements based on training volume and intensity.
Provide guidance on pre- and post-workout nutrition to enhance performance and recovery.

subtasks.title: Calculate Daily Macronutrient Requirements
subtasks.description: Determine the athlete's protein, carbohydrate, and fat needs based on training volume and intensity.
subtasks.expected_output: Daily macronutrient breakdown for the athlete.

subtasks.title: Design Pre- and Post-Workout Nutrition Guidelines
subtasks.description: Develop specific recommendations for meals or snacks to be consumed before and after training sessions to optimize performance and recovery.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed pre- and post-workout nutrition guidelines.

subtasks.title: Monitoring and Adjustments
subtasks.description: Monitors the athlete's progress throughout the week, adjusts the training plan as needed, and provides feedback to optimize performance.
subtasks.expected_output: Regular progress reports, performance feedback, and adjustments to the training plan based on athlete's response.
responsibilities: Track athlete's performance metrics and recovery markers.
Modify the training plan based on feedback, fatigue levels, and competition readiness indicators.

subtasks.title: Track athlete's performance metrics
subtasks.description: Monitor key performance indicators such as strength, endurance, and speed throughout the week.

subtasks.title: Monitor recovery markers
subtasks.description: Keep track of the athlete's recovery markers such as heart rate variability, sleep quality, and muscle soreness.

subtasks.title: Adjust training plan based on feedback
subtasks.description: Modify the training program according to athlete's feedback on the difficulty, soreness, and overall performance.

subtasks.title: Provide feedback on performance
subtasks.description: Offer feedback to the athlete on their progress, areas of improvement, and overall performance.
